lines: You have decided to use these experiences and the people in them to have extramarital relationships.

It is suprising to see a person as trustworthy as you, do something so potentially self-destructive. As a result of entering this icon you have a cheap affair with ${loverName}, without getting caught. There is no guarantee that
you will always be this lucky, however.
Still a tomcat, even at your age. By now one would think that you would have settled down. Your Trustworthiness score shows that you have done your share of shady things in your day.

This time your wife is not going to tolerate it. She knows about your penchant for fooling around. After all, guys like you don't exactly keep it a secret. She is willing to give up everything and bid you a fond farewell.
"Don't give me that 'beg for forgiveness' bull!" she says. Nothing will work. She sues you for divorce and wins.

That's a joke--you really didn't have much of a choice. She was at her wits' end this time and nothing could have changed her mind. It's a good thing you saved your breath. She sues you for divorce and wins.
